logs_by_owner.map: function (doc) { if(doc.owner) { emit ([doc.date, doc.owner], { date: doc.date, message: doc.message, owner: doc.owner }); }}

updates.delete_expired: function (doc, req) { if (doc.date < req.query.mindate) { doc._deleted = true; return [doc, 'deleted']; } else return [doc, doc._id] }
updates.log: function(doc, req) { doc.log.push(req.body.record); doc.last_update = req.body.record.timestamp; return doc._id; }
updates.state: function(doc, req) { doc.state = req.body.state; return doc._id; }
